title: The Best of Us - Part One
description: Bad things happen to The Best of Us…Viola Freeland-Graham and her family have suffered the abrupt loss of her youngest brother Anthony. Confused and bewildered, they try feebly to put the pieces back together but that proves to be harder than they could imagine. Decades later the wounds haven’t healed. Her parent’s lives were turned upside down. Her siblings are farther apart than ever. Depression from the loss of her brother weighs heavily on her family and their relationships, including her marriage to high school sweetheart Marcus Graham.Marcus Graham and his family have dwindled in number to almost nothing. After the death of his parents and abandonment by his eldest brother, he determines to handle life alone. A self-made man, he has a thriving business and the picture-perfect lifestyle. Or does he? Dark and painful secrets threaten to destroy Viola and Marcus and the fire is turned up on the burning ship that is their marriage. Will their love be able to endure the smoldering volcano about to erupt in their lives?
author: Nakeia Council-Daniels
